name: ImageS3
body:
ImageS3 is a simple image storage service which enables you to easily turn Amazon S3 into an image hosting service.

### Features
 RESTful APIs.
 Web-based management tool with live monitoring.
 Manageable image thumbnail templates
 All your app's images stored and managed in one place.
 MongoDB for image metadata storage.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
